item.title: French Grammar for Dummies
item.description: Chapter 6 Present tense Subject pronouns je tu il/elle on nous vous ils/elles On refers to people, il(s)/elle(s) refer to things When vous is used as a formal form of tu, it’s still considered as plural Conjugation of verbs Conjugation: verbs change its format according to gender/number/pronoun e.g. pronouner (to speak) je parle, tu parles, il/ells/on parle nous parlons, vous parlez, ils/elles parlent Verbs with regular conjugation can be classified as 3 groups -er, -ir, -re -er verbs e.
